block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: LED ON LED when push button pressed

block.comment: 0.1-0.2 it is a good practice to add a short 0.1-0.2 delay here because when there is multiple such loops without delay inside the program may slow down because it is looping too fast

scripts.comment: check for pressing of push button
Digital Input use this block Select the input pin from the drop down list Can click on the block to get the value of the input at the pin

custom-block.comment: GPIO26 get digital input at pin GPIO26

scripts.comment: 0 if we press and hold the push button click on this block will get "0"
Note that this rounded rectangle block is a "Reporter" block which cannot be connected directly to other blocks It must be drop into other blocks as the value of the block
